sendgrid.subject: GoInstant Maps Demo Invitation
sendgrid.invite_body:
Your friend, %s, has invited you to join them on GoInstant Maps Demo. %s is online right now, waiting for you! Click the link below to join them:

%s

Together with %s you'll be able to find places and navigate together, in real time. You will see when %s does something, and they'll see when you take an action as well. You can jointly browse GoInstant Maps Demo and explore the world together!
